JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Experienced part-time waiter, ranging from 40-140 hours per month, depending on what you need.

We are one of the oldest Mexican restaurants in Copenhagen. We have been announcedas  the winner of Trip Advisor's prestigious award, Certificate of Excellence, in 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019.

We are looking for a colleague with at least 6 months of experience in the restaurant business, who is flexible, cooperative and can handle stressful situations. You need to be stable, social, experienced and want to work with your heart. It is an a la carte restaurant with room for approx. 50 people. The shifts are in the evening from kl. 1700. The salary is agreed individually according to experience starting at DKK 130,- per hour plus vacation money 12,5% and tips.
